Uses of Class
ch.phonon.StarPoint

  • Packages that use StarPoint 
    Package Description
    ch.phonon  
    ch.phonon.drawables  

    • Uses of StarPoint in ch.phonon

      Methods in ch.phonon that return StarPoint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static StarPoint StarPoint.createRotatedStarPoint(StarPoint a, double angle)
      Rotates the components of a StarPoint about an angle and gives back a new StarPoint object with the resulting rotated StarPoint.
      static StarPoint StarPoint.getDifference(StarPoint start, StarPoint end)
      Get vector difference (end - start) as StarPoint representation
      static StarPoint StarPoint.getScaledVector(StarPoint vector, double scale)
      Gives back a new scaled vector.
      StarPoint Positionable.getStarPoint()
      Returns the global position of an Positionable object.
      static StarPoint StarPoint.getSum(StarPoint a, StarPoint b)
      Calculates vector sum of two StarPoints and gives back a new object.
      static StarPoint StarPoint.getUnitVector(StarPoint vector)
      Calculates the unit vector in direction of vector in it's base.
      StarPoint StarPoint.rotateStarPoint(double angle)
      Rotates the components of the this object about an angle and gives back a reference for convinience.
      Methods in ch.phonon with parameters of type StarPoint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static StarPoint StarPoint.createRotatedStarPoint(StarPoint a, double angle)
      Rotates the components of a StarPoint about an angle and gives back a new StarPoint object with the resulting rotated StarPoint.
      static double StarPoint.getAngle(StarPoint a, StarPoint b)
      Calculates the (smaller and always positive angle) of two StarPoints using the cosine equation.
      static double StarPoint.getAngleOrientation(StarPoint a, StarPoint b)
      Calculates the angle orientation of b above a.
      static double StarPoint.getCounterClockWiseAngle(StarPoint a, StarPoint b)
      Calculates the ciunter clockwise oriented angle, that is positive from StarPoint a to b ; 0 <= angle(b,a) < 360.0
      static double StarPoint.getDerminant(StarPoint a, StarPoint b)
      Calculates the determinat spanned by the two StarPoint vectors a and b
      static StarPoint StarPoint.getDifference(StarPoint start, StarPoint end)
      Get vector difference (end - start) as StarPoint representation
      static double StarPoint.getDistance(StarPoint begin, StarPoint end)
      Calculates the scalar distance between two StarPoints
      static double StarPoint.getDotProduct(StarPoint a, StarPoint b)
      Calculates vector dot product of two StarPoint vectors
      static double StarPoint.getNorm(StarPoint sPoint)
      Calculates the length norm of the StarPoint
      static double StarPoint.getOrientedAngle(StarPoint a, StarPoint b)
      Calculates the oriented angle of two StarPoints The angle is oriented from a to b.
      static StarPoint StarPoint.getScaledVector(StarPoint vector, double scale)
      Gives back a new scaled vector.
      static StarPoint StarPoint.getSum(StarPoint a, StarPoint b)
      Calculates vector sum of two StarPoints and gives back a new object.
      static StarPoint StarPoint.getUnitVector(StarPoint vector)
      Calculates the unit vector in direction of vector in it's base.
      void StarPoint.setPoint(StarPoint point) 
      void Positionable.setStarPoint(StarPoint starPoint)
      Sets the StarPoint of the Positionable

    • Uses of StarPoint in ch.phonon.drawables

      Methods in ch.phonon.drawables that return StarPoint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StarPoint DrawableScaleReference.getBegin()
      Obtain reference of the begin point of the scale
      StarPoint DrawableScaleReference.getCenterStarPoint()
      Get the center point of the scale
      StarPoint DrawableScaleReference.getEnd()
      Obtain reference of the end point of the scale
      StarPoint DrawableScaleReference.getRelativeVector()
      Get the measured distance represented as StarPoint vector in picture coordinate dimensions.
      StarPoint AbstractDrawable.getStarPoint() 
      Methods in ch.phonon.drawables with parameters of type StarPoint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DrawableScaleReference.setBegin(StarPoint begin)
      Set the begin of the scale by using a StarPoint
      void DrawableScaleReference.setEnd(StarPoint end)
      Set the end of the scale by using a StarPoint
      void AbstractDrawable.setStarPoint(StarPoint starPoint) 
      Constructors in ch.phonon.drawables with parameters of type StarPoint 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractDrawable(StarPoint starpoint, LocalOrientation localOrientation)
      This main constructor needs to be called by all implementing classes and sets the starPoint, the initial and the actual local orientation of the Drawable.
      DrawableBox(StarPoint starpoint, LocalOrientation localOrientation, int width, int height)
      Constructs a drawable box and initializes it (red color)
      DrawableCircle(StarPoint starpoint, LocalOrientation localOrientation, int width, int height)
      This constructor is used to define a DrawableCircle object by providing its StarPoint position and LocalOrientation
      DrawableCircularStar(StarPoint starpoint)
      Constructs the star at the StarPoint location.
      DrawableCoordinateSystem(StarPoint starpoint, double height, double width)
      Constructs the DrawableCoordinateSystem in placing the origin, the width and height of the coordinate sytem frame
      DrawableDiamondStar(StarPoint starpoint)
      Constructs the star at the StarPoint location.
      DrawableLine(StarPoint starpoint, LocalOrientation localOrientation, java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double point1, java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double point2)
      This constructor is used to define a DrawableLine object by providing its StarPoint position and LocalOrientation and the coordinates of the beginning and end point of the line.
      DrawablePicture(StarPoint starpoint, LocalOrientation localOrientation, java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
      This constructor constructs a DrawablePicture based on a centering StarPoint given in picture coordinates, a local orientation and a BufferedImage already loaded in memory.
      DrawablePicture(StarPoint starpoint, LocalOrientation localOrientation, java.lang.String pictureFileName)
      This constructor constructs a DrawablePicture based on a centering StarPoint given in picture coordinates, a local orientation and a file name.
      DrawableScaleReference(StarPoint begin, StarPoint end)
      Constructs a DrawableScaleReference based on a begin point and and end point.
      DrawableStar(StarPoint starpoint)
      Constructs the star at the StarPoint location.
      DrawableText(StarPoint starpoint, LocalOrientation localOrientation, java.text.AttributedString text)
      The text item represented by the AttributedString parameter text is prepared by this constructor to be drawn at the position identified by the starpoint and localOrientation parameter.
